line.style: fill: none; stroke: currentColor; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2;

polyline.style: fill: none; stroke: currentColor; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2;

path.style: fill: none; stroke: currentColor; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2;
